name: Infection Detection
description:
Welcome to Infection Detection, where a mini virus must intercept the main system without being wiped out by any Virus Scanners. Tap, Tap, and Tap or else you might be caught and destroyed by the system. Beat the high score and share your progresss

(------------------------------------------)

TazerWire Corp. (previously CoolKeann Inc.) is an amazing company for developing Apps, Games, and other useful Creations. Your simple support inspires us to make MORE!
